alert.note: Alert for Otero (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 30 at 8:11PM MDT until September 30 at 8:30PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM MDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN OTERO COUNTY... At 811 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Orogrande, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Orogrande. This includes Highway 54 in New Mexico between mile markers 24 and 41. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
